title: Juicy Ladies
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Raw, Juice bar, Take-out, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Formerly all-veg but reported 2015 that bone broth was offered in sealed containers in a grab n' go case. Juice bar, tonic bar, and cafe offering plenty of vegan choices such as smoothies and fresh juices, salads, entrees, wraps, and baked goods. Expanded in 2013 to include additional space and added bee products and egg to its menu. Egg is reportedly prepared in separate cookware and utensils. Comfortable seating area with tables, couches and artwork on walls for sale. Also sells supplements and skin care products.
